net.kuujo.vertigo.feeder

Interface PollingFeeder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component<PollingFeeder>, Feeder<PollingFeeder>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPollingFeeder

    public interface PollingFeeder
extends Feeder<PollingFeeder>
    A polling feeder. The polling feeder reads input from code by periodically polling a handler for new data. If the feed handler fails to emit new data when polled, the feeder will reschedule the next feed for a period in the near future.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Detail

      • setFeedDelay

        PollingFeeder setFeedDelay(long delay)
        Sets the feed delay. The feed delay indicates the interval at which the feeder will attempt to poll the feed handler for new data.
        Parameters:
        delay - The empty feed delay.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • getFeedDelay

        long getFeedDelay()
        Gets the feed delay. The feed delay indicates the interval at which the feeder will attempt to poll the feed handler for new data.
        Returns:
        The empty feed delay.

      • feedHandler

        PollingFeeder feedHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<PollingFeeder> handler)
        Sets a feed handler. The feed handler will be periodically polled for new data. Each time the feed handler is polled only a single message should be emitted. This allows the feeder to maintain control over the flow of data. If the feed handler is called but fails to feed any new messages to the network, the feeder will reschedule the next call to the handler for a period in the near future.
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked for feeding data to the network.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • ackHandler

        PollingFeeder ackHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<String> ackHandler)
        Sets an ack handler on the feeder.
        Parameters:
        ackHandler - A handler to be invoked when a message is acked.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • failHandler

        PollingFeeder failHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<String> failHandler)
        Sets a fail handler on the feeder.
        Parameters:
        failHandler - A handler to be invoked when a message is failed.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.

      • timeoutHandler

        PollingFeeder timeoutHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<String> timeoutHandler)
        Sets a timeout handler on the feeder.
        Parameters:
        timeoutHandler - A handler to be invoked when a message times out.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.
